question.text:
Match the type of diversity with its correct example
 
Type of Diversity Example
a. Genetic Diversity i. Amphibians are found more on the Western Ghats than Eastern Ghats
b. Species Diversity ii. The Scandinavian country like Norway has lesser diversity than India
c. Ecological Diversity iii. The properties of Rauwolfia plant in different parts of Himalayas is different

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

solution.text: Genetic Diversity - shown by Rauwolfia vomitoria which is a medicinal plant in terms of potency and concentration of chemical (reserpine). Species diversity- Greater amphibian species diversity is seen in western ghats than eastern ghats. Ecological diversity- India has a greater ecosystem diversity in terms of deserts, rain forests, mangroves, coral reefs, wetlands, estuaries, and Alpine meadows than a Scandinavian country like Norway.
